```coq
intros net net' e Hdirectly_committed Hforall.
apply directly_committed_lifted_directly_committed in Hdirectly_committed.
pose proof (msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset _ _ _ _ _ _ Hdirectly_committed) as H'.
apply refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset in H'.
destruct H' as [quorum [HNoDup [Hlength [Hforall']]]].
exists quorum; split; auto.
intros h Hin; apply Hforall'; auto.
Qed.

original: intros net net' e Hdirectly_committed Hforall. apply directly_committed_lifted_directly_committed in Hdirectly_committed. pose proof (msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset _ _ _ _ _ _ Hdirectly_committed) as H'. apply refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset in H'. destruct H' as [quorum [HNoDup [Hlength [Hforall']]]]. exists quorum; split; auto. intros h Hin; apply Hforall'; auto.
